metadata.title: CVE-2023-0797 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcrop inlibtiff/tif_unix.c:368, invoked by tools/tiffcrop.c:2903 andtools/tiffcrop.c:6921, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit afaabc3e.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
